name: DEER HUNTING IN HUNTER VALLEY: CHAMPIONSHIP 2017
name_original: DEER HUNTING IN HUNTER VALLEY: CHAMPIONSHIP 2017
description:
Hunt deer in the snow valley and become the ultimate buck hunter!

The hunting fever is at the high, so it’s time to grab your hunting gears and guns and prepare for deer hunting in the snowfield and forest hunting grounds. As the season is on! So hunt as many deer as you can to become deer hunting champion of 2016. Get rewards and buy new guns!

Chase deer as many as you can in the limited time strategically without alerting other surrounding animals in the beautiful and real snow valley environment.

It’s Open Season - join real hunting today!

GAME FEATURES
- Multiple waves with limited time
- Enjoy sniper scope zooming
- Real-time deer hunting experience
- Beautiful and Attractive environment and graphics
- Much more…

Like and share the game with others, lets us know your thoughts, your feedback and positive criticism will be appreciated.
